name: Lost Hope (itch)
description:
Play as a  Mercenary stranded in a post-apocalyptic wasteland overrun by mutated monsters! Fight your way through and eradicate hoards of mobs! Gather special mutated seeds which allow you to grow your own strong weapons. Level up as you progress through sets of islands. 

Made as a submission for GameQode Game Jam within 1 week

Note:

We tried our hardest to polish this game as much as possible within the 1 week time limit, and I'm proud of how far we got. And it was very fun coming up with various ideas / elements to add to the game. However, we couldn't fix some minor bugs in time for the deadline. Hopefully it wont be too much of an issue and we hope you'll still enjoy our game!

*Please don't disable the cursor lock feature in the options as it may break your aiming functionality*

Instructions:

  1.  Download the game from the download section below.
  2.  Right click on the archive and select Extract to Lost Hope. 
  3.  Open the newly made folder called Lost Hope.
  4.  Double Click on Lost Hope.exe to launch the game
  5.  Enjoy :)
